Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hornets won by a score of 103-83.
Others: LaMelo Ball had 10 points, 4 rebounds, 3 assists, 1 steal, and 1 block while shooting 4/12 from the field in his first 13 minutes of playing time.
Ball finished the game with 25 points, 6 rebounds, 8 assists, and 2 steals while shooting 10/23 from the field and 5/12 from the three-point range in 32 minutes of playing time.
The Hornets are 3-5 in their first eight games of the new season.
The Hornets most recently beat the Detroit Pistons (at home) by a score of 108-107.
The Pacers are 4-4 in their first eight games of the new season.
The Pacers will play their next game on Sunday evening when they return home to host Jalen Brunson and the New York Knicks in Indiana.
